original_text: The soldiers then led Paul as far as the steps of their building. Then they had to carry him because the crowd was so angry.
korean_text: 바울이 층대에 이를 때에 무리의 폭행으로 말미암아 군사들에게 들려가니

sentences.original_text: as far as the steps of their building
Then they had to carry him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들은 그를 메고 가야 했다

sentences.original_text: because the crowd was so angry
